properties.description: We are open Monday 10-5pm, Tuesday 10-5pm, Wednesday 10-6pm, Thursday 10-5pm, Friday 10-5pm, Saturday 10-4pm We welcome anyone to come and enjoy our warm spaces. Find a quiet corner to work, study or read. Or join in with one of our many free activities for all ages to create something, learn something, write something, read with a group, play games or just have a drink, chat and make connections with others at our Coffee companions sessions.
